I guess, either WebServerManager have to filter it out where its editModel 
change event coming from and do something about it. When I execute some command 
for my accessbean gen, it will throw this exception.

The web service manager should not have been notifying and it also should be
filtering to only events it cared about.  This has been fixed and released to
the WTP nightly builds.  It will be in the 610 WTP Integration build.
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
